SundropPromenade.DancingBush: This bush seems to move suspiciously, even though there is no breeze...
SundropPromenade.JojaWindow: Looking inside, you can see the bored receptionist playing on their phone.
SundropPromenade.SeafoodSign: Crab, lobster... all of these meals contain seafood.
SundropPromenade.Grill: The meat on the grill smells heavenly.
SundropPromenade.Lounge1: Someone has kicked sand all over this chair. How rude!
SundropPromenade.Lounge2: Uh oh! Someone lost their sunglasses under this chair!
SundropPromenade.Lounge3: A few of the straps on this chair are starting to stretch from use
SundropPromenade.Lounge4: This looks like a relaxing place to take a nap!
SundropPromenade.Lounge5: The sun has warmed this lounge chair invitingly...
SundropPromenade.Lounge6: What a great place to relax and get a sun tan!
SundropPromenade.Lounge7: This looks like a relaxing place to take a nap!
SundropPromenade.Surfboard1: The lifeguard's surfboard. The red finish is sleek and smooth to the touch.
SundropPromenade.Surfboard2: The lifeguard's surfboard. Are those... tooth marks?!
SundropPromenade.Surfboard: The lifeguard's surfboard. Sand has been kicked up on it.
SundropPromenade.FirstAid: This must be the lifeguard's first-aid kit. Hopefully they don't have to use it often!
SundropPromenade.TideSign: The sign says, "DANGER! RIP TIDE WARNING! SWIM AT YOUR OWN RISK."
SundropPromenade.JoeBoat: There's still some water on the inside from the boat's last excursion.
SundropPromenade.Window1: You can see people moving around inside, but it's none of your business.
SundropPromenade.247: The sign on the door says, "Out to lunch. Be back soon!"
SundropPromenade.Bench1: A nice shady place to sit and take in the sights!
SundropPromenade.Trash: What a shame that someone threw this trash on the ground. We have to respect our planet!

SundropDiner.DinerSeating: The sign says, "Please have a seat anywhere you'd like!"
SundropDiner.DinerMenu: It's a menu... they serve a wide variety of delicious sounding dishes!

SundropHotelLobby.Clock: One clock is still ticking, but just as motionless as the others.
SundropHotelLobby.Coffee: There's coffee in the pot. I don't want to know how long it's been sitting here.
SundropHotelLobby.Board: There are notices and fliers posted on this board, but they're all very old.
SundropHotelLobby.Safe: The safe may have deteriorated naturally over time, but someone has definitely tried to break in.

SundropJoja.Expired: These have been expired for... several years!?
SundropJoja.Cheap: Cheap, unpleasant, and overpriced. That's the Joja way.
SundropJoja.Oil: There's something floating in the oil...
SundropJoja.Water: A six pack of tap water... for 2,000G!?
SundropJoja.Candy: A selection of cheap candy that nobody really likes to eat

SundropJoeShack.PalmTree: This tree is obviously not real, but you can't help but be charmed by it.
SundropJoeShack.Hammock: This hammock looks very comfortable to sleep in.
SundropJoeShack.Shellphone: There's a piece of tape on this seashell... it reads, "Shellphone"
SundropJoeShack.FishTank1: There is a nametag taped to the outside of the tank: "Joe Jr."
SundropJoeShack.FishTank2: The fish looks at you knowingly.
SundropJoeShack.FishTank3: The tank is meticulously well maintained.
SundropJoeShack.Fridge: An odd smell is coming from the fridge. Better not open it!
SundropJoeShack.Pincer1: A large crab skitters menacingly across the table! It might be best to leave it alone.
SundropJoeShack.Pincer2: Sergeant Pincher glares at you sternly.

SundropPlaza.Flowerbed1: There's not a single weed in the flowerbeds, but the same can't be said for the lawn.
SundropPlaza.Flowerbed2: The fragrance of these flowers can be smelled from the street!
SundropPlaza.Flowerbed3: These flowers look to be carefully maintained.
SundropPlaza.Flowerbed4: I wonder what kind of flower this is? I've never seen one before!
SundropPlaza.Flowerbed5: Bees buzz faintly as they move from flower to flower.
SundropPlaza.Fountain: "In honor of those who fought in the Gotoro War"
SundropPlaza.Grave1: "In loving memory..." the message on this stone is old and faded.
SundropPlaza.Grave2: These flowers seem fresh. Someone must have left them here recently.
SundropPlaza.Tree: This tree has stood silent watch over many peoples' grief.
SundropPlaza.Grave4: The birth and death dates on this stone match... How sad to lose someone on their birthday...
SundropPlaza.Grave6: Moss covers most of this gravestone.
SundropPlaza.Grave7: This gravestone is cracked on one corner. It seems to be from natural causes.
SundropPlaza.Grave8: The flowers are starting to wilt.
SundropPlaza.Grave10: A husband and wife are buried side by side, according to this stone. It reads "Together again at last."
SundropPlaza.Grave11: The stone's death date is blank. This person must still be alive.
SundropPlaza.Bench1: The bench is inscribed with a dedication from Lady Stardew

SundropCityHall.Book1: "Ten Ways to Improve Your Job Performance"
SundropCityHall.Book4: A stack of law books. Mostly.
SundropCityHall.Water: "Out of Order. Have some coffee instead."
SundropCityHall.Coffee: Quintuple shot espresso... Isn't that illegal?!
SundropCityHall.Book6: "The Official Book of Political Law - Edition XVIII"
SundropCityHall.Bed: This looks like a nice place for a good boy to take a nap.
SundropCityHall.Desk1: There's a pawpring on the signature line.
SundropCityHall.Desk2: "Mr. Cake - Mayor of Sundrop" is engraved on the plaque.
SundropCityHall.Bulletin1: There's a schedule for taking Mr. Cake on walks posted here.
SundropCityHall.Bulletin2: A flier about food that's healthy for dogs to eat is pinned to the board.
SundropCityHall.Bulletin3: "5 Tips for bonding with your dog!"

SundropShearDesign.Hairspray: "Now with four times the volume!!!" It must be some kind of hair product.
SundropShearDesign.Photos: Photos of models with trendy hair styles are taped to the mirror
SundropShearDesign.Magazines: All of these magazines are about hair or fashion.

SundropJewelryStore.Expensive: You feel less rich when you stand next to this display case.
SundropJewelryStore.PrismaticShard: Pairs of glittery earrings, each adorned with small pieces of prismatic shard
SundropJewelryStore.Shiny: So shiny... want... to touch... NO I really shouldn't!
SundropJewelryStore.Ruby: A well-polished ruby sits inside the glass. You can almost see your own face in its luster.
SundropJewelryStore.Amethyst: Different colored sets of hoop earrings are on a black display stand.
SundropJewelryStore.Calcite: What kind of jewelry could this calcite mineral be used for?
SundropJewelryStore.Studs: Assorted pairs of stud earrings. Each pair is silver and adorned with different types of minerals.
SundropJewelryStore.Mermaid: A rack of metal earrings rest atop the glass case, but your eyes are drawn to the sparkling deep blue mermaid pendant inside the case.
SundropJewelryStore.IridiumBand: A glowing iridium band.... You don't even want to know how expensive it is.
SundropJewelryStore.WeddingRing: It is unusual to see such a glamorous and expensive wedding ring outside of Zuzu City.
SundropJewelryStore.Necklace1: Inside is a flashy necklace with a gold chain and dangling small ruby gems.
SundropJewelryStore.Necklace2: The glass case is so brightly cleaned that you can see your own face in its reflection.
SundropJewelryStore.Rings1: Rings made from miscellaneous ore and mineral. Each ring is of a different, vibrant hue.
SundropJewelryStore.Jewelry: A glass case filled with an array of glimmering jewelry.
SundropJewelryStore.Bracelets2: Each bracelet has several charms attached, ranging from plants and animals to symbols of Yoba.
SundropJewelryStore.Necklace3: A silver necklace holds a tear-shaped emerald pendant.
SundropJewelryStore.Bracelet: Delicate bracelets sit on black velvet.
SundropJewelryStore.Rings2: Matching bands in silver and gold, brilliant diamonds rings… this must be the marital section.
SundropJewelryStore.Bracelets1: These bracelets can be personalized with messages or symbols.
SundropJewelryStore.Necklace5: The necklace is adorned with a sparkling silver locket. An amethyst gemstone is studded in the center of the locket.
SundropJewelryStore.Necklace6: A heart-shaped iridium pendant hangs from a beaded, silver necklace.
SundropJewelryStore.Rings3: These simple but refined rings are almost too shiny...
SundropJewelryStore.Copper: A plain copper bar; likely ordered for use in custom-made jewelry.
SundropJewelryStore.Gold: This glossy bar of gold has an almost amber hue.
SundropJewelryStore.Quartz: Using refined quartz is a great low-cost alternative to gemstones.
SundropJewelryStore.Cushion: This posh cream-colored pleather cushion looks firm but inviting.
SundropJewelryStore.Forge: It doesn't seem wise to touch a hot furnace.
SundropJewelryStore.Hammer: What's a jeweler without his trusty hammer?
SundropJewelryStore.PoppyNote: It's a note signed by Poppy... It appears to be instructions on how to care for the plant, with a plea to not let this one die...
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerSucculent: Looks to be a succulent of some type. It has a name tag that says "Frank" on it.
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerAlbums: There are photo albums and old worn out textbooks about metalworking on the shelf
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerPhotos: Photos of Spencer and his sister are on the wall beside some photos of him with his old army crew.
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerClock: This antique cuckoo clock appears to be in great shape despite its age.
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerPalm: The leaves and tree are fake but it definitely adds needed color to the room.
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerTable: Huh, these potted forget-me-nots are very well cared for. They must be his favorite.
SundropJewelryStore.SpencerFicas: A live tree! It looks like it desperately needs some water.
SundropJewelryStore.PinkBook: This appears to be a romance novel.

SundropHQLobby.Coffee1: There's a note attached... "No Caffeine until your work is done, Chef! -Ento"
SundropHQLobby.Coffee2: There's a note attached... "Joke's on you, Ento. I don't even like coffee! -ChefRude"
SundropHQLobby.Fountain: There appear to be cake crumbs floating in the water...

SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaChest: There’s a note attached to the chest: "I'm old. I didn't want to die here, buuut it's dangerous to go alone, so take this."
SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaPot1: Filled with strange little green stones, all precisely uniform.
SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaPot2: A single black jewel shines from inside the pot.
SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaPot3: An image of a large, golden jewel is painted on this empty thing.
SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaPot4: This old pot is so thin, it's practically begging to be broken...
SundropSecretAreas.ZeldaBrazier: It is too dark to see properly without all of these lit.
SundropSecretAreas.UndertalePlant: Weird... You could have sworn you heard a voice come from here.
SundropSecretAreas.UndertalePatchL: There's a blue switch hidden behind this pillar. It won't budge.
SundropSecretAreas.UndertalePatchR: Mmm... these flowers would make a delicious tea.
SundropSecretAreas.UndertaleHalfPillar: Ew, now your hands are covered in super sticky seeds.
SundropSecretAreas.UndertalePillar: There's a red switch behind this pillar. Looks like it's stuck, though.
